name: Play Dead! #2 - Spiderpus & The Screeching Weasels
name_original: Play Dead! #2 - Spiderpus & The Screeching Weasels
description:
A  story about a band, and their strange life on the road accompanied by a surprisingly lively dead dog.

FEATURES:

  • Dozens of unique, hand-drawn backgrounds and CGs
  • Full voice-acting!
  • An episodic story released in small, bite-sized chapters
  • Four (4) dumb musicians
  • One very good (ghost) boy
  • C'mon, you want to know what a Spiderpus is, don't you?
This is Chapter 2 of the story! If you haven't read the first one, you might want to start there.

VOICE CAST:

  • Josh Portillo as Corey
  • Allen Chan as Kaleb
  • Jazzy Oliver as Brian
  • Rebecca Chiara Marano as Savannah & Thief
  • Geoffrey M.  Butler as Production Manager
  • Rebecca Chiara Marano also as Store Employee, Spiderpus, & Screeching Weasels

NOTES & WARNINGS:

Content warning for profanity, cartoon violence, blood, bones, dead things, and some monsters with funky teeth.

This is a kinetic novel, so there are no plot-altering choices or alternate endings to unlock. Grab some popcorn, sit back, and enjoy the story.

This is intended to be a comedic supernatural/horror story, and for the most part, isn't all that much scarier than your average episode of Scooby-Doo. For the most part.

---

Dear Streamers: If you'd like to stream this game, you are more than welcome to (in fact, I'd love a link to it)! However, do keep in mind that it's geared towards older teen and adult audiences, and make note of the content warnings (there is a fair amount of cursing.)

HEY! Psst. Yeah, you. This game is free-to-play, but the team and I have worked really hard on it. If you're feeling generous enough to tip us a dollar or more, you'll get access to some wallpapers featuring a certain very good ghost doggo as thanks!
